Name: Wabbit Stew
Application: Gain flight. Included in your Movement action, you may move in any direction for the next [3] rounds.

Name: Potent Pollywog Powder
Application: Restore [100]% Focus. Any leftover Focus is treated as temporary, lost at the end of the battle.

Name: Mandola Root Stew
Application: Restore [5]{TL} Health at the beginning of each turn until the end of combat.

Name: Bonemeal
Application: Improve restorative effects of a consumable by [50]%.

Name: Saber Tooth Extract
Application: Next attack inflicts Bleeding (1){[TL]}.

Name: Anima
Application: Restore [50]% of your max Health or revive a dead combatant with [25] of their max Health.

Name: Nightmare Essence
Application: Permanently increase max Health by current Class's [base Health].

Name: Nightvision Juice
Application: Become unaffected by lighting conditions for the next [hour].

Name: Rancid Tea
Application: Reduce the Stamina, Mana, and/or Focus cost of your next action by [5] (min 0).

Name: Divination Bones
Application: Gain Advantage on your next [5] checks.

Name: Eternal Cocktail
Application: Become immune to KO for the next [2] turns; you can still die.

Name: Pork Chops
Application: Restore [80]% of your max Health, and [50]% of your max Stamina, Mana, and Focus.

Name: Orange Bone Powder
Application: During your next turn, if an attack would miss, try again [1] time for free.

Name: Pill of Strength
Application: Increase the Rank of every action by [1] until the end of the battle.

Name: Potion of Flight
Application: Appending your Movement action, you may may move in any direction until the end of the battle.

Name: Napalm
Application: Your attacks that inflict Burning can stack until the end of combat.

Name: Essence of Fire
Application: Your element is changed to Fire. You are immune to Fire-element attacks. This lasts until the end of combat.

Name: Mushroom Soup
Application: Restore [10] of your Mana, Stamina, and Focus.

Name: Sprinting Paw Broth
Application: At the beginning of combat, increase your Initiative check by [10].

Name: Potion of Mystery
Application: Roll 1d20 and divide by 2 as A. Use ability of index A for free.

Name: Wish
Application: Choose [1]: 1) Resurrect a Dead or KO'd party member. 2) Automatically befriend a non-brilliant enemy combatant. 3) Automatically learn one of your Doctrine abilities as a normal sideboard ability.

Name: Essence of Morning
Application: You have [20] Defense Points. Spend X Defense Points to reduce the Rank of any incoming attacks by X. This lasts until all Defense Points are spent.

Name: Essence of Evening
Application: You have [20] Offense Points. Spend X Offense points to increase the Rank of any actions by X. This lasts until all Offense Points are spent.

Name: Essence of Logic
Application: You have [100] Check Points. Spend X Check Points to increase any Checks by X. This lasts until all Logic Points have been spent.

Name: Pumpkin Pie
Application: Divide [100]% between yourself and any chosen allies in your space to regain that percentage in Health.

Name: Tough Stew
Application: You gain Temporary Health equal to your [Max Health] until the end of the turn. Any damage taken is afflicted to your Temporary Health first.

Name: Meatballs
Application: Restore a total of [20] points between your Stamina, Mana, and Focus.

Name: Pumpkin Soup
Application: You are immune to bonus damage from elemental advantage until the end of combat.

Name: Root Beer
Application: Consume to restore [10]% max Health.

Name: Tropical Delight
Application: Gain +[5] on your next non-luck Check.

Name: Pollywog Souffle
Application: Increase your Evasion scores by [2] for the duration of the battle.

Name: Gudon's Liver Soup
Application: Reduce the next incoming attack's damage by [50]%.

Name: Mince Fire Blob
Application: The next [1] action you make can be Burned (execute now and pay next turn).

Name: Cooked Monster Meat
Application: Increase your Max Health and current Health by [1] level until the end of the battle.

Name: Rendered Fat
Application: Gain an additional [100]sta until the start of your next turn.

Name: Refined Stardust
Application: Next [1] Luck checks automatically passes.

Name: Omnifuel
Application: Restore all your Vitals to [100]%.

Name: Caveman Soup
Application: Increase your Talent scores by 2 for the next hour.

Name: Meat Lover's Pizza
Application: This comes in six pieces. Each combatant may have 1 piece per hour or until no longer in effect. Consuming a piece increases your Vitals, Melee, Magic, and Skill scores by one level until the end of the battle.
Ingredients: 1x Bone Marrow, 1x Wabbit Haunch, 1x Beef, 1x Gudon Liver
